Plot: With the sudden death of her loving father, Danielle is made a servant by her new stepmother. She also has two new stepsisters, one quite kind but the other one really horrid. Still, ...
Title: Ever After: A Cinderella Story
Actors: Drew Barrymore, Anjelica Huston, Dougray Scott, Patrick Godfrey
Writer: Susannah Grant (screenplay), Andy Tennant (screenplay), Rick Parks (screenplay)
